medium: Pen and black and brown ink and brown wash on laid paper
provenance: Peter Lely, Lugt 2092 (1618-1680), London. [Alister Mathews, Bournemouth, England]. Mr. and Mrs. Lester Avnet, New York. Malcolm and Esther Bick, Springfield, Mass. (by 1968). Sale, Sotheby's, July 2, 1984, no. 15, for £1, 226.50, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1984-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Death of Saint Jerome
